title: CUNYSphere
description: This project, designed for CUNY students, provides a two-fold service approach for students. Firstly, it offers a selection of vetted academic resources, assisting students in their studies. Secondly, it creates a dedicated space for students to interact, discuss, and collaborate on academic topics.
technologies: React.js, Node.js, Next.js, Express.js, Bcrypt.js, passport.js, postgresSQL, Firebase, AWS S3

title: Animal Hunting
description: This first person shooter Unity VR game consists of 4 different animal hunting levels, each with their own differents features.

title: The History of Art
description: This hackathon project consists of the whole history of art and our opinions to the future of art.

title: Why so cold?
description: This computer vision project implements OpenCV to capture real time video from a webcam detecting faces and smiles using pre-trained Haar feature-based cascade classifiers. A photo will only be taken if you are smiling.
